thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Suzanne Costello

author: Suzanne Costello
title: Suzanne Costello
text: I have 3 kids aged 11 months, 2 , 5 and I have loads of different car seats but my issue was with the seats I had as the kids were getting older and the high back booster seat for the 5 year old who is quite big, was just buckled with the cars own seat belt, the seat always seemed too free to move about even though it was fitted correctly. I wanted 2 seats that were isofix, forward facing, ideally no isofix base as they take up so much room in the car and could grow with the kids. I found some options that were over 400 euro and included fussy isofix bases. I started to think what I wanted didn't exist ,by chance I found uberchild , I spent lots of time reviewing the seats, I was amazed and a bit suspicious after years of wasting money on other seats. This time I knew exactly what I wanted. Everything including the price which is phenomenal seemed genuine. I bought the seats on a Sunday night, 2 days later seats had arrived. They were fitted into the car that night, they are non fussy, no isofix base but solid in the car. I'm delighted with them, kids love them, the recline on them is fairly minor but they are comfortable, well padded, buckle is easy to fit , the seat grows with the kids too, I genuinely woukd highly recommend them
